name: First Day
detailed_description:
Who would have thought that nuclear weapons could be dangerous ...
How does it start over? From the very beginning...
After a nuclear explosion, the planet was covered with a huge wave of atomic energy, which wiped out almost all life from the face of the earth.
From the land that we knew there were only stones, sand and debris ...
All the liquid on the planet has turned into alcohol.
The only plants that remained and were able to more or less adapt to the new atmosphere were the mutated cacti, the last drinking liquid remained in them.
Those few who miraculously survived were lucky enough to call it that, because now they have to hide from deadly sandstorms and crowds of zombies ...
Many of them would rather die than dig for whole days in the garbage in the hope of finding something edible there or something else that will prolong their “life.”

First Day - is a strategy in which you have to revive a civilization destroyed by a nuclear explosion, well, or something that is generally possible to revive after a nuclear explosion.



  • Find survivors, invite them into your squad, increase the population!
  • Collect trash, look for weapons, as well as other useful things and tools.
  • Reflect the attack of zombies, and other enemies, defend and repair the camp!
  • Collect and produce the resources necessary for survival!
  • Build fortifications and useful facilities!
  • Improve skills and equip your people!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
